column1: PHP_Code,is_vulnerable,Description

<?php
$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$sanitized = filter_var($tainted, FILTER_SANITIZE_MAGIC_QUOTES);
 $tainted = $sanitized ;
 
$query = "(&(objectCategory=person)(objectClass=user)(mail='". $tainted . "'))";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__proc_open__func_FILTER-CLEANING-magic_quotes_filter__userByMail-concatenation_simple_quote

<?php
$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$tainted = htmlspecialchars($tainted, ENT_QUOTES);
$query = sprintf("(&(objectCategory=person)(objectClass=user)(cn='%s'))", $tainted);
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__proc_open__func_htmlspecialchars__userByCN-sprintf_%s_simple_quote

<?php
$handle = popen('/bin/cat /tmp/tainted.txt', 'r');
$tainted = fread($handle, 4096);
pclose($handle);
$sanitized = filter_var($tainted, FILTER_SANITIZE_EMAIL);
if (filter_var($sanitized, FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL))
 $tainted = $sanitized ;
else
 $tainted = "" ;
$query = "(&(objectCategory=person)(objectClass=user)(cn='". $tainted . "'))";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__popen__func_FILTER-CLEANING-email_filter__userByCN-concatenation_simple_quote

<?php
$tainted = shell_exec('cat /tmp/tainted.txt');
$tainted = preg_replace('/\'/', '', $tainted);
$query = "name='". $tainted . "'";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__shell_exec__func_preg_replace__name-concatenation_simple_quote

<?php
$handle = @fopen("/tmp/tainted.txt", "r");
if ($handle) {
 if(($tainted = fgets($handle, 4096)) == false) {
 $tainted = "";
 }
 fclose($handle);
} else {
 $tainted = "";
}
//no_sanitizing
$query = sprintf("!name='%s'", $tainted);
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__fopen__no_sanitizing__not_name-sprintf_%s_simple_quote

<?php
$handle = @fopen("/tmp/tainted.txt", "r");
if ($handle) {
 if(($tainted = fgets($handle, 4096)) == false) {
 $tainted = "";
 }
 fclose($handle);
} else {
 $tainted = "";
}
$tainted = addslashes($tainted);
$query = sprintf("!name='%s'", $tainted);
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__fopen__func_addslashes__not_name-sprintf_%s_simple_quote

<?php
class Input{
 public function getInput(){
 return $_GET['UserData'] ;
 }
}
$temp = new Input();
$tainted = $temp->getInput();
$tainted = pg_escape_string($tainted);
$query = "(&(objectCategory=person)(objectClass=user)(mail='". $tainted . "'))";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);

<?php
$tainted = system('ls', $retval);
$re = "/^.*$/";
if(preg_match($re, $tainted) == 1){
 $tainted = $tainted;
}
else{
 $tainted = "";
}
$query = "!name='". $tainted . "'";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__system__func_preg_match-no_filtering__not_name-concatenation_simple_quote

<?php
class Input{
 private $input;
 public function getInput(){
 return $this->input['realOne'];
 }
 public function __construct(){
 $this->input = array();
 $this->input['test']= 'safe' ;
 $this->input['realOne']= $_GET['UserData'] ;
 $this->input['trap']= 'safe' ;
 }
}
$temp = new Input();
$tainted = $temp->getInput();
$sanitized = filter_var($tainted, FILTER_SANITIZE_EMAIL);
if (filter_var($sanitized, FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL))
 $tainted = $sanitized ;
else
 $tainted = "" ;
$query = "!name='". $tainted . "'";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__object-indexArray__func_FILTER-CLEANING-email_filter__not_name-concatenation_simple_quote

<?php
class Input{
 private $input;
 public function getInput(){
 return $this->input[1];
 }
 public function __construct(){
 $this->input = array();
 $this->input[0]= 'safe' ;
 $this->input[1]= $_GET['UserData'] ;
 $this->input[2]= 'safe' ;
 }
}
$temp = new Input();
$tainted = $temp->getInput();
$re = "/^.*$/";
if(preg_match($re, $tainted) == 1){
 $tainted = $tainted;
}
else{
 $tainted = "";
}
$query = "name=' $tainted '";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);

 );

 );

<?php
$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$re = "/^.*$/";
if(preg_match($re, $tainted) == 1){
 $tainted = $tainted;
}
else{
 $tainted = "";
}
$query = "!name=' $tainted '";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__proc_open__func_preg_match-no_filtering__not_name-interpretation_simple_quote

<?php
$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
//no_sanitizing
$query = "(&(objectCategory=person)(objectClass=user)(cn=' $tainted '))";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);

 private $input;
 public function getInput(){
 return $this->input['realOne'];
 }
 public function __construct(){
 $this->input = array();
 $this->input['test']= 'safe' ;
 $this->input['realOne']= $_GET['UserData'] ;
 $this->input['trap']= 'safe' ;
 }
}
$temp = new Input();
$tainted = $temp->getInput();
$tainted = preg_replace('/\'/', '', $tainted);
$query = sprintf("(&(objectCategory=person)(objectClass=user)(cn='%s'))", $tainted);
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__object-indexArray__func_preg_replace__userByCN-sprintf_%s_simple_quote

<?php
$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$sanitized = filter_var($tainted, FILTER_SANITIZE_MAGIC_QUOTES);
 $tainted = $sanitized ;
 
$query = "name=' $tainted '";

$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);

<?php
$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$sanitized = filter_var($tainted, FILTER_SANITIZE_EMAIL);
if (filter_var($sanitized, FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL))
 $tainted = $sanitized ;
else
 $tainted = "" ;
$query = sprintf("name='%s'", $tainted);
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);

 public function getInput(){
 return $this->input;
 }
 public function __construct(){
 $this->input = $_GET['UserData'] ;
 }
}
$temp = new Input();
$tainted = $temp->getInput();

$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);

<?php
$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$re = "/^.*$/";
if(preg_match($re, $tainted) == 1){
 $tainted = $tainted;
}
else{
 $tainted = "";
}
$query = sprintf("name='%s'", $tainted);
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__proc_open__func_preg_match-no_filtering__name-sprintf_%s_simple_quote

$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),

 );

$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);

}

 );

 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);

}

ldap_close($ds);

 1 => array("pipe", "w"),

 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);

 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);

}

 $tainted = $sanitized ;

 0 => array("pipe", "r"),

 );

$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);

 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);

}

<?php
$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$sanitized = filter_var($tainted, FILTER_SANITIZE_EMAIL);
if (filter_var($sanitized, FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL))
 $tainted = $sanitized ;
else
 $tainted = "" ;
$query = "(&(objectCategory=person)(objectClass=user)(cn='". $tainted . "'))";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);

 );

 );

 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$tainted = htmlspecialchars($tainted, ENT_QUOTES);
$query = "!name='". $tainted . "'";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__proc_open__func_htmlspecialchars__not_name-concatenation_simple_quote

<?php
$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),

 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$tainted = pg_escape_string($tainted);
$query = "!name=' $tainted '";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);

<?php
$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$re = "/^.*$/";
if(preg_match($re, $tainted) == 1){
 $tainted = $tainted;
}
else{
 $tainted = "";
}
$query = "(&(objectCategory=person)(objectClass=user)(mail='". $tainted . "'))";
//flaw
$ds=ldap_connect("localhost"); 
$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);
?>,1,CWE_90__proc_open__func_preg_match-no_filtering__userByMail-concatenation_simple_quote

 );

 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),

 );

$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);

 fclose($pipes[0]);

}

$descriptorspec = array(
 0 => array("pipe", "r"),
 1 => array("pipe", "w"),
 2 => array("file", "/tmp/error-output.txt", "a")
 );
$cwd = '/tmp';
$process = proc_open('more /tmp/tainted.txt', $descriptorspec, $pipes, $cwd, NULL);
if (is_resource($process)) {
 fclose($pipes[0]);
 $tainted = stream_get_contents($pipes[1]);
 fclose($pipes[1]);
 $return_value = proc_close($process);
}
$sanitized = filter_var($tainted, FILTER_SANITIZE_MAGIC_QUOTES);
 $tainted = $sanitized ;
 
$query = "!name=' $tainted '";
//flaw

$r=ldap_bind($ds);
$sr=ldap_search($ds,"o=My Company, c=US", $query); 
ldap_close($ds);

 );
